Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes William J. Cooley and Patrick Humiston to receive certain credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law
Summary: Authorizes William J. Cooley and Patrick Humiston, both currently city of Buffalo police officers, to receive certain credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize William J. Cooley and Patrick Humiston to receive certain credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law
